description: Awarded to the game that demonstrates excellence across all aspects including gameplay, art, sound, and innovation.
Recognizes games with the most engaging, fun, and well-designed gameplay mechanics.
Awarded to games with outstanding visual design, art style, and graphical presentation.
Recognizes games that push boundaries and introduce unique concepts or mechanics.
Awarded to games with exceptional audio, music, and sound effects that enhance the experience.
Voted by the community, this award goes to the fan-favorite game of the jam.
